mapper.select: select id, title, sub_title, description, file_type, file_path, user_id, create_time, is_del, is_lock from article limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select create_time from article where user_id = #{id} and is_del = 0 and is_lock = 0
select id, title, sub_title, description, file_type, file_path, user_id, create_time, is_del, is_lock from article where date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{createTime} and user_id = #{authorId}
mapper.insert: insert into `article`(title, sub_title, description, file_type, file_path, user_id, create_time, is_lock) values (#{title}, #{subTitle}, #{description}, #{fileType}, #{filePath}, #{userId}, #{createTime}, #{isLock})
